content: I am a first-year Ph.D. student in Computer Science Engineering at the University of Michigan, advised by Prof. Atul Prakash. My research interests primarily fall on adversarial machine learning. Specifically, I am investigating techniques that can improve robustness of deep neural networks.

title: Tianji Cong
Can Attention Masks Improve Adversarial Robustness?
